entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few rain showers or periods of drizzle beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
